original_text: Your people will be like wood for the fire, and only ashes will remain. They will burn as easily as thorn bushes that people cut down and throw on the fire. Your people will be like wood for the fire, and only ashes will remain. They will burn as easily as thorn bushes that people cut down and throw on the fire. Your people will be like wood for the fire,
korean_text: 민족들은 불에 굽는 횟돌 같겠고 잘라서 불에 사르는 가시나무 같으리로다

sentences.original_text: Your people will be like wood for the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 백성들은 불을 위한 나무와 같을 것입니다
